website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those who want an unscented version in a large amount.
pros: A huge amount of salts per bag (19 pounds) means you won't run out anytime soon
Small granules dissolve quickly, giving you a better soak without the lingering grit
No added scent makes this perfect for those who are sensitive to fragrance
cons: As it is sold in bulk packages, some users may not want so much at a time

website_summaries.verdict: Top-grade and pure magnesium sulfate grains, easily soluble in bath for multiple health benefits.
pros: High-quality USP grade of purity and non-GMO, with a granule size designed to dissolve readily
Provides detoxification and pore cleansing, also good for muscle pain
This salt can also be used to fertilize plants, garden, and lawn
cons: Large size bag is hefty and more difficult to carry and store, with more likelihood of rips and spills

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again soon!
customer_reviews.text: I love this huge bag of Epsom Salt! It's cheaper to buy this bag rather than the small bags of Epsom salt at Walgreens or CVS. I use a cup of this in my bath about 3 or 4 times a week with essential oils. Using this will help replenish the Magnesium that your body is lacking. After I take 1 bath with this, my headaches are gone instantly. Fast shipping! The San Francisco Salt Company also has friendly customer service because they sent me an e-mail to follow up on how I liked this. I will buy again soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A bath must have
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Epsom Salt to use in baths. Magnesium is so important for our bodies! Putting this in my bath water has helped me sleep better at night and has lowered my anxiety symptoms. I don't have severe anxiety, no panic attacks, but I found my self getting uncomfortable and anxious when I am in situations that I am unable to control as a whole like pools and planes and crowds or play places ( I have a 5 year old and 2 year old). This has helped me ease off a little and be in the moment to enjoy the situation more than be anxious in the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A must for calming the nerves and relaxing the muscles!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It's a natural way to get the body's magnesium needs and it's so relaxing. After a good warm soak in the tub, I can sleep like a baby. Did you know that magnesium (Epsom Salts) is lost in the body through stress, and who doesn't have stress these days? This is a great way to replenish your magnesium levels. Be sure to soak for at least 20 minutes. I keep these Epsoak Salts on hand all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MissRhondaLee

customer_reviews.title: Chronic Lyme Sufferers Rejoice
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has Chronic Lyme Disease and takes baths every other day as it helps sweat out the "bugs" that the antibiotics kill off. We were buying the small bags at the local store and it was getting expensive quick! I found these on amazon and cant be happier. Price per pound is so much cheaper when you buy in bulk and if you take baths often, you will go through it.
customer_reviews.author: KBWICKHAM

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only Epsom salts I use for my recipes! The 19lb bag will last FOREVER and the salt is premium quality. Everyone loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves perfectly into warm water for soaking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an additive to a home spa treatment, so I'm using about a cupful at a time. It dissolves quickly into the warm water and doesn't leave a grit in the bottom of the tub. It's perfect. The only oddity is that it's a little hard to close the zip-strip tight, so a bit of moisture seems to be seeping into the contents and causing "clumps." This also dissolve easily, or could be broken up prior to adding it to your water. I would buy this product again, but not for quite a while due to it's size.
customer_reviews.author: SandieR

customer_reviews.title: Great for aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I was trying to get better from my car accident (rear ended). It was hard for me to move my neck and I always had pain on my upper back. I would put about a cup of epsom salt in the bathtub with hot to warm water(water was filled so I can just lay down flat, no need to fill it up all the way). I'd stay for about 20 minutes or just when the water would start to get cold. I would feel relief during the bath and for a few hours I afterwards. I still have a lot left and plan to use it whenever I feel achy.
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: Returning happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to make my own bath fizzies not knowing how big thus bag is. It's huge! I've ordered before from this company and i really like their products. My fizzies turned out magnificent.
customer_reviews.author: Rika

customer_reviews.title: The best value for Epsom salts
customer_reviews.text: Epsom salts are a great addition to the regimen of anyone with joint or muscle pain Pros: good price, unscented with no parabens or oils to make the bathtub slippery, over time, they help with swelling and stiffness Cons: the packaging isn’t great. I have ordered these salts several times and each time have finally just cut into the bag. Thus means that they are not resealable and will clump. It’s not a big deal, but worth knowing Bottom line: 16 Oz in a bath help to decrease my edema and joint pain. Add a bit of body wash or lotion to a handful to create a DIY body scrub. They are a great addition to any household’s medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works Great (Not for Margaritas Though)
customer_reviews.text: I wandered The Outback for months looking for an ancient healing rock, it was reported to work wonders on body pain. As you can imagine, wandering around for months on end in the blistering heat of the Australian Outback will cause tremendous body pain. Turns out, there was never a healing stone to begin with. 23 showers and 19 hours of travel time later, I was sitting at my desk when I spotted this 19lb bag of Epsom Salts. My journey was over, I found the healing stones I had been searching for, and on Amazon Prime! Epsom Salts work great, if you have body pain soak in this and you WILL feel better.
customer_reviews.author: J Dean

customer_reviews.title: Better than Ancient Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking mag baths practically daily for the past year as part of my DR ordered protocol for Lyme. I used Ancient Minerals for 11 months of that time, but it clumped up in the covered apothecary jar by my bath. This doesn’t clump up, is less pricey and performs the same as Ancient Minerals, so this is my new Go To.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very large and heavy bag. It is convenient to have such stock as I am pregnant and have an achy body and take a lot of baths at night to relax. I only gave it 4 stars because I’m not sure if the potency is as good as other salts I’ve used previously, but it could just be that my body is rebelling and harder to get relief the further along I am. Overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaAnn

customer_reviews.title: Does Not dissolve quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bag of epson came in good condition, product doesn't have a scent. I have found that the product doesn't dissolve easily. Will not buy again, too expensive since I found that walmart has 8lbs for only $5.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Talley

customer_reviews.title: Not scent free
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 2 years now and it has been helpful for detox baths. Recently, they must have changed something as I had an order come scented when it specifically says unscented and has never been that way. We are sensitive to fragrances and would never buy if it was. Returned it and they sent a replacement that was also scented. Returned again for refund and they never processed the return and now the timeframe has passed. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: nioniel19

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Won’t be purchasing again, I started taking epsom salt baths about 4 times a week for bacne a couple of months ago, fell back and started again, decided to buy this since it was cheaper than the Maximum strength Ultra Epsom salt I buy at Whole Foods. I’m almost done with this 19lbs bag and haven’t noticed a big difference as I would with the other brand, I’ve also added more than 2 or 3 cups and still don’t feel it works. Going back to the Ultra Epsom for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: So I figured out through trial and error that a footbath containing 1 cup of this + some tea tree oil is more effective on my particular type of athletes foot than my prescription medicine. I don't recommend this as a medical alternative, but I think it says good things about this product. Would 100% recommend for general hygiene or an ADDITIONAL treatment for foot fungus.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good salt but damaged bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the product itself, however, as other reviewer‘s have commented on and even shown, the salt bag itself had a box cutter slice in it. I didn’t weigh the bag to see if the full 19 pounds were there, but how on earth are these getting sent this way? The slice was facing the bottom of the box so it wasn’t even possible that I caused it by opening the box (I also didn’t use a blade so...) I’d really like to order this product again but this lack of quality control makes me reconsider that.
customer_reviews.author: Shesteiny

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore muscles and good sleep
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer of this stuff. Put 2 cups of this in a bath before you go to sleep and you will be very happy. I also like to soak in this after a really hard workout. Both of these are really great uses for the salt. Epsom salt is really helpful for any athlete and given I workout and play tennis daily, I use quite a bit of it. I'm always surprised how fast 19 lbs seems to go between two people. For sure this is great stuff, I love the brand and the price is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Last few bags didn't devolve well
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and the packaging was great the bag was thick material so no holes and the easy tear top worked great and was easy to reseal. It don't have a smell and i like that because i use my own essential oils. It also desolved faster then some other brands i have used in the past and i was relaxed when i was finished in my bath -----update----- I did really love this product when I first started using it however the last 2 bags I got the crystals seem to be bigger and it don't want to devolve in the water....i hope this is only a temp problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mm3rica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality, will continue to order.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this product three times now. It’s wonderful! I use it for myself, my kids, and my husband. I’ve even put some in a jar with baking soda and bentonite clay and gifted it as a detox bath to friends. We’re all magnesium deficient, this is an easy, relaxing and beneficial way to add magnesium to your system. After a bath with these salts I’m always so relaxed and refreshed! I’ll continue to order these!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Nice Epsom Salt - great for almost everything
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new Epsom salt convert. I love the stuff. Foot soaks are the easiest and fastest way to reduce stress and increase magnesium in the blood. I have a calcium deficiency problem and had no idea that supplements were not helping improve my calcium levels at all - because my magnesium was being depleted so quickly from stress, etc. This particular brand is really impressive because the salt dissolves well, which means I can absorb it faster. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: relieves headache
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me epsom salt is good for soothing down the muscles pain as well as eliminating migraines. I had a few stressful days last month that caused a headache. I placed my head in the water infused with the salt while lying in a bath and noticed that the headache was gone. I agree that epsom salt has benefits for the health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT REAL EPSOM SALT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT REAL EPSOM SALT!! EPSOM SALT IS SUPPOSED TO LOOK LIKE SMALL CRYSTALS, THIS IS POWDERY. IT ALSO DOES NOT GIVE THE ORIGIN OF IT. ONLY SAYS "PACKAGED IN THE US" WHICH MEANS IT COMES FROM WHO KNOWS WHERE. BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I could not OR did not want to use my cannabis concentrate ( in colorado). I filled the bath tube with hot and some cold water sat in it for 16 minutes and was able to fall asleep with in less then ten minutes after getting out of the tube. I did but the 2 pound bag first to see what I thought of the salt , then I bought the 19 pound bag . very happy with the salt
customer_reviews.author: woof

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: my wrist has been hurting for half year, and my chiropractor suggested I try to soak my hand in warm water with epson salt, it feels really good after it, at least for a couple hours after the soak, my wrist is relaxed, I don't feel much pain. It is a big package, can last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: H.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Ole Epsom Salts!
customer_reviews.text: I buy it by the 20 pounds... and keep a bucket in my bathroom for adding a portion to my showers (stopper in shower)... as a foot soak. Also add it to vinegar in hot water for a nice foot soak while watching TV. Helps tremendously with softening calluses and making for sweet feet.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: Glad to get the epsom
customer_reviews.text: Glad to get the epsom, cant go wrong. When it arrived the box was broke with a tear in the bag and salt spilling out before i even received the package.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: If going to order this make sure on an order by itself so you do not have the same issue
customer_reviews.text: This is more for the packaging of this product, the people who packed these twonitems did not put a barrier between them so now i have a bag of Epsom salt with a split close to the bottom and now have Epsom salt all in the box and leaking to my floor. The bag will split even more as soon as i pick it up to move it
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCollum

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time ordering it
customer_reviews.text: This was my 2nd time ordering it. I love that I can order this big of a bag. It’s something I used pretty regularly for baths and special home made gifts. The bag is resealable and had a moisture preventer.
customer_reviews.author: Atattooedbeauty

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have a large bag in my bathroom so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a large bag in my bathroom so I don't run out quickly. I put 1-2 cups in my bath along with a 1/4 teaspoon of vitamin C powder to neutralize the chlorine in the water. Very important. Wait five minutes and get into the bath. It really works to relax you and helps recover sore muscles if you work out, and I get some of my magnesium needs met also.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My salt bag was opened and spilled all over the ...
customer_reviews.text: My salt bag was opened and spilled all over the box, I probably lost at least 3-4 pounds of salt.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Blase

customer_reviews.title: Really appreciate the bulk size AND the fragrance free product.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why manufacturers have to add fragrance to EVERYTHING, but as one of many folks allergic to fragrances, I always have to search out products free of these. This product meets both that criteria as well as being available in a large, bulk size. The packaging is very substantial, and easy to open and close. I just keep it in a corner of my bathroom for when I need a epsom salt soak for sore muscles. The attractive packaging is a nice bonus! Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great for relaxing, not my favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand, especially the cleans and detoxify salts, but I wanted to try something new. This is quite good for taking a relaxing bath before bed, even if it doesn't smell as good as lavander epsom salts. Also, the bag is fairly small, it finished after 5 baths... I wish they had bigger bags, offering a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo G

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for epsom baths for the entire family, it works well and is a good price for the amount given, we live on an island where we couldn’t find any salt baths without fragrance, additives and other unnecessary ingredients so getting a big bulk bag to last a while is necessary. We did have to switch containers after a while because the bag got a hole in it (the bag is good quality kids just ruin things 🤷🏻‍♀️).
customer_reviews.author: Thatweirdfamily

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I soak in a hot tub with salts for at least two hours once or twice a week. I'm now 64 and sometimes have sore muscles after working out with weights and aerobic workouts almost daily...so it's best to soak it, keep limber and do what you can to stay healthy. Ageing is a lot easier with Epsom salts! Thank you - very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: Good for people and good for plants. I haven't been able to find a big bag like this in my local stores so being able to order this from Amazon is a blessing. I use it for long, warm bath soaks. We also use it to boost our vegetable plants in the garden. Try it on your tomatoes or pepper plants. It boosts the yields and helps get plants off to a great start. Forget the Miracle Gro and other chemicals. This stuff is amazing in the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Epsom salt at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from this company several times and have always been happy. I first started getting the big bag of it for my dog. He had cushings disease and was prone to infections and skin conditions. I would give him epsom salt baths and it really helped him a lot, I was amazed and thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use the Dr. Teals Epsom Salts before switching to this and it's very comparable. I miss my own essential oils in and find this is far more cost effective and may even work a little better! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Emily R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth its weight in salt
customer_reviews.text: I compete in powerlifting. I use two cups of this every single day and it lasts me about a month. Without it I'd be a beat up wreck. I'm amazed that San Francisco hasn't pushed out all but the largest corporations. I thought any company with a brain would've already moved to Nevada or TX. But nope, these guys are here and they're great. And the packaging even has a one way valve that allows you to push air out. My only tip for them is to please switch to packaging that is easier to re-seal. Tip: check out the small bags of Dr. Teal's. The ziploc part works the first time every time.
customer_reviews.author: BruteStrong

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid product.. Good value. Buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Good price good value . Bought to mix with Himalayan pink salt to make bath salts. Can’t go wrong with magnesium salts for soaking - muscle aches and pains and inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Booksaboutpeace

customer_reviews.title: Generally good - but disappointed with latest order
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this several times before and it’s a great product for using in the bath (helps muscle recovery). The package that just arrived this week was opened and made a mess all over the box and floor. I went through the Amazon prompts for a refund and I have to mail the opened bag back to get a refund which is a huge hassle. We should be able to get a new bag shipped to us since this was came opened... and not have to mail back the bag that spilled all over the box (and my floor).
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lubenow

customer_reviews.title: Important Whole Foods
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I would consider wanting on a desert island if I had nothing else. Packed with nutrients, vitamins and minerals, it's a must have and go-to for all of us now that soils are depleted and we don't get the same vitamins and minerals we used to, which is why so many of us have inflammation nowadays. Great company and kind customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Winter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to perfumes and scents. I just needed the Epsom salts to soak my foot after toenail surgery. This does have scents but they are natural scents. It is so relaxing and it is helping me heal pretty good. Would recommend, esp. if you are allergic to fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: Artgal

customer_reviews.title: but I'm disappointed that the package was 3-pounds less
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this product. This time the bag seemed a bit smaller than the first order so I weighed it. It weighed 16-pounds instead of the 19-pounds as advertised. The product is ok, but I'm disappointed that the package was 3-pounds less. I will order a different brand going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like??
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be magnesium deficient so I regularly do epsom baths to bring up my levels. I used to buy small bags at drug stores but stumbled on this one day. It's about the same price, or possibly a bit cheaper. But you get it delivered right to your door. And it lasts for months rather than a week or two. I haven't had any problem with my magnesium levels since finding this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulk Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've started taking Epsom salt baths regularly now for my lower back and joint pain. The large bags were a great buy! (I got tired of replacing the smaller ones from Target more often.) There isn't a smell, which is perfect so I can add whatever drops of essential oils I choose (lavender, rose, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Stock up! This is great Epsom salt.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you look at the sizes of this! This was larger than I expected!! Great Epsom salts. Excellent for use with essential oil recipes!
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Helps me I hope it helps you
customer_reviews.text: Great value and works great. Tried it the first night it arrived after a long day at work. I'm an equipment mechanic and on my feet mostly all day it also doesn't help I have P.F. so my feet bother me a lot. They went into the water aching, and came out feeling good.
customer_reviews.author: Rippy

customer_reviews.title: This is a BIG bag of Epsom Salt
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG bag of Epsom Salt. This bag is the same size as a 20lb bag of dog food. The bag has a reclosable zip top and what appears to be some form of moisture release valve in back. The salt is loose and scoops easily. I can't smell any odor and its clear/white. Not really certain what would make this a 5, but its really a commodity, so 4s all I'll give.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount to buy bulk
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make my own bath salts. I just use a container from a previous bath salt purchase. And then I add maybe 10 drops of lavender essential oil and shake the container to mix it all up. I’d put it up on display in a glass container but I already have other stuff up there. Perfect amount to buy bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Keep Life Easy

customer_reviews.title: Love Epsom salt
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm addicted to Epsom salt. I work out and lift a lot and definitely feel a difference in my soreness and overall fatigue after taking a bath with it. You won't notice it while taking a bath, but there's a definite difference in the days following. I don't use this for indigestion so I can't review about that and don't use it for planting either. It's too precious to waste on those things haha
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Plain Epsom Salt I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I love the 19 lbs size. I go through at least one a month. It dissolves in the water easily. It works well to extend my more pricey scented Epsom salt baths without making my skin dry or irritated. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: E Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I'm using Dr. Teals Epsom salt from years and wanted to try this after looking at price and review. I'm very disappointed after couple of uses. I didn't get the relaxed feeling, it doesn't de-solve in the water easily, it leaves high residuals part which don't desolve in the water. I'm going back to Dr Teals.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering. My son has an autoimmune issue that he's recovering from. Part of his problem is detoxing. A homeopath I consulted with said it sounds like he's magnesium deficient and he has detox die off symptoms. So I went back to my original pack of this salt and gave him a foot bath twice a day. It helped him tremendously. He started sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Integral part of my self care
customer_reviews.text: I find this product is an integral part of my self care routine. I experience muscle cramping in my calves from time to time. Taking a bath with this Epsom salt relaxes my mind about falling asleep and not experiencing the incredible stress of nighttime muscle cramps.
customer_reviews.author: A_Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value, and really soothes tired muscles.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these Epsom salts. I was buying Dr Teal for a long time, and while I liked the scent, this is a much better value. Sometimes I will add a drop or two of essential oil or a splash of bubble bath for the aromatherapy. My husband appreciates the non scented salts because the scented ones give him a headache. Weekly epsom baths really help us manage stress and treat sore muscles. Very pleased and will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Product With Many Remedies
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after working out on leg day. I'd sit on the tub with two cups of salt mixed in with ice water as a post workout recovery. The next day I would feel amazing. I also had a slight knee pain and this would help alleviate the pain. Another benefit with Epsom salt is that those who had a bad case of nail fungus can just soak in your nails with the saltwater mixture and it will slowly remove the fungus within a matter of months. (I'm guilty of having a bad case of nail fungus due to having ingrown nails in my childhood).
customer_reviews.author: Uriel D.

customer_reviews.title: Soak it up
customer_reviews.text: Great product not only for soaking your feet or for use in jacuzzi. It does relaxes your body and muscles. I would buy it again but a little pricey in Amazon. If you do some research you. An find a better price
customer_reviews.author: Zenel Alushi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After first ordering these Epson salts I was hooked. I use it 2-3 times a week for the purpose of absorbing magnesium (usually lacking in us all) which helps with the premature ventricular contractions I get. These salts are the best quality I've found. They sparkle like snow, never clump and are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a toenail removed and had to soak his foot twice a day for several weeks. It got tiresome and expensive to get the smaller bags at the store. This was a good amount and worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in Katy, TX

customer_reviews.title: Old Fashioned remedy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and was properly packaged. Epsom salts is a wonder cure for all types of skin ailments and it is holistic. It takes a little longer to work than topical or internal medications, but it works excellently. This is an old remedy that works just as great as ever, with no side effects! Works topically for bacterial and fungal infections, once dissolved in warm water. Use 2-3 times daily.
customer_reviews.author: Birdwatcher2

customer_reviews.title: On my second 20lb bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Epsom salts for years to relax tired aching muscles....and prevent the headaches that accompany them from turning into an ugly migraine. I loved the idea of a large bag at my footstep so I wouldn't run out. This is a very nice quality product that takes me from full body fatigue to relaxed in 30 min. My toddler enjoys her salts too. Great quality at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of the salts and the fact that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the salts and the fact that they sell them in bulk - super convenient. I do like the sturdy packaging as others have mentioned, but when I opened mine with the tear notch the zip seal got damaged (note to future self and other customers, use scissors to cut straight across next time). I still might get a container and proper scoop eventually, but in the meantime I'm just getting a replacement bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it's so much more economical compared to the 2-3lb bags. I can't comment on how I feel medically since I always feel better after a bath. But, when I soak I can actually feel a layer of dead skin coming off which is great! This unscented option is perfect for you to add in a few drops of your own essential oils into the bath depending on your ailment.
customer_reviews.author: MellyMel

customer_reviews.title: Bought before, will buy again...
customer_reviews.text: It's just a great deal, I go through too many smaller bags and bought this one for a second time because it lasts so long. I bought unscented, and just FYI the bag is big, but 19lbs can be confusing so I took a picture (after I opened and used) of the bag next to 1 gallon plastic bottle of baby soap.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I use these epsom salts with tea tree oil and soak my feet. My feet always feel good after soaking in it so I would say it does what it is supposed to. 🙂 The package is great as it is resealable.
customer_reviews.author: Schnogg Mom

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 will always buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is the beat purchase it great quality bath salts and a lot of bag for your buck. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! 100%
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product. The scent is light and doesn’t over power the room. Having 9lbs has allowed me to use as much as I feel necessary for each bath without fear of running out.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Best Epsom salt I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality Epsom salt! I soak my feet in this every night before bed to help with sore feet / aches from walking/running. It’s clearly sourced really well and really does help with muscle pain. It also doesn’t have a strong smell, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Really quality epsom salt and huge amount for price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite epsom salt, I think it’s a lot better than dr teals and the big bag lasts forever! I will keep buying this so I don’t have to buy the expensive tiny bags from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Herod

customer_reviews.title: Epsoak Epsom Salt
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an epsom salt expert but I love how warm and relaxed my body feels when I get out of the bathtub. It goes without saying that it feels fantastic whilst I'm sitting in the tub and since it doesn't contain any fragrance, I can add a few drops of essential oils to enjoy different smell each time. I look forward to my bath time every night. The price is very reasonable and shipping was on time. Having this almost 20 lbs bag delivered to my door was another nice thing.
customer_reviews.author: aka Nancy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bath salt!
customer_reviews.text: This bath salt actually works! I was skeptical at first. But it reduced the pain in my knees while bathing after intense basketball sessions. I use this all the time now! Def recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it helps
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this thing really helps, but one thing I know, it’s a LOT of salt! I can’t tell if it makes a difference but knowing it’s there, it feels good... enjoyed my bath all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many expensive bath salts out there these days, some of them are really great. This product however is amazing! It’s a heavy bag so great that it shipped directly to your house we’re not lugging in your car. It’s high-quality and a better value than anything you’ll find even at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: IAR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I buy this over and over again! I want unscented, good quality Epsom salts to add my own essential oils to for the most relaxing spa experience ever! This fits the bill perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: ReadRight

customer_reviews.title: Salt baths for months
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I can tell the difference between when I use this and when I don't but it makes me feel luxurious for some reason. Huge, heavy bag. Storage is a little awkward, but I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing from them for a few years now, Product always arrives in a very timely manner and is packaged up very tight and nicely done. I usually purchase the very large bag of Epson salt. I work 4 very long days and my body aches on about day 3. A few soaks a week in the bath and I am almost as good as new! I love that I can buy the 19lb bag, it does last me for about 2 months depending on how many shifts I pull a week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for bath bombs, take awhile to dissolve
customer_reviews.text: Gritty, takes a long while to dissolve. I wasn't impressed with the price vs the price at Kroger or Wal-Mart per pound for plain epsom salts. Dr teals is much better and dissolves instantly! I will most likely not buy again unless i am making bath bombs because the long dissolve time is good for them!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's Epsom Salt, I would have given the product ...
customer_reviews.text: 'm a loyal customer and have bought this product at least 5 times-I'm an athlete and Epsom Salt baths keep me healthy, this is the best price I've found...and sometimes it's even better if the owner (who has phoned me to follow up to inquire about their product - I call this great customer service) discounts it to 27.99 which was done last December to help drive traffic. Awesome! And no, I'm not a paid spokesperson.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brimelow

customer_reviews.title: Soak It Up
customer_reviews.text: After a long day at work, soaking is my absolute favorite thing to do. Lavender scent is one if my favorite. So this was a win win for me. Great price and delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kepkim

customer_reviews.title: Dandruff Be Gone
customer_reviews.text: I don't have dandruff because I scrub my head with this everyday
customer_reviews.author: Kourosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Resealable Bag, Better Muscle Relief
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy resealable bag makes it easy to use this in small amounts. Soaked with this epsom salt after being sore for a couple days and it relieved my muscles and felt great on my skin. It has a subtle scent. Amazing product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Dont ever stop carrying this bulk size please! This is fabulous. I use for many things, but epsom salt baths with baking side and essential oils is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: RecklessEyeballing LLC

customer_reviews.title: In love with this ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I use every day for pain. I have for years. My husband now uses it at least weekly. He use to say he doesn't do baths, just showers. Obviously he is sold too.
customer_reviews.author: S&T

customer_reviews.title: Helps with anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve felt with anxiety related issues for years and this bath salt is a major contributor to relieving most of the effects on my body. Leaves me feeling relaxed and melts away the tension and soreness in my muscles. Great bank for the buck too!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Resealable Bag = Winning
customer_reviews.text: I use this for baths, or just soaking my feet. It helps me with my skin conditions and pain in my feet from work. The scent is almost non existant so its easy on the sniffer. Love that this bag is resealable!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rage

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We needed a larger bad of these salts because we starting soaking our feet regularly. This is the best value for the money. Also excellent quality. I'll be a returning customer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HappyWomanToo

customer_reviews.title: Great size and presentation
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! . The presentation is great and convenient . I even liked it better than the one purchased at the stores now very hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Was so tired of spending $5-8 at the store for much smaller bags that lasted only a few baths... this one was perfect at almost 20 pounds! We are a very active family and often after our renovations or yard work, gardening, working out etc.. we are very sore. This does the trick! I add a few cups to my bath water and soak for 15-20 minutes. I feel so much better and sleep better as well. Great detox too. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mtcgoblue

customer_reviews.title: Love this salt, good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love this salt, it's the best bang for your buck and even contains magnesium. It's the only one I use, way better than other more popular brands. I've been using it exclusively for the last 4 years now, and am sticking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Bloom

customer_reviews.title: worked well in a heated foot bath massager.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. It dissolved right away and didn't leave big chunks behind. Helped with my dry skin and aches from standing all day at my job.
customer_reviews.author: NBA Films

customer_reviews.title: Bag was torn in middle
customer_reviews.text: There was a tear near the middle so most on my salt is in the box and all over my floor. Definitely needs a stronger bag if it can’t make it though shipping. So I technically received 11ish pounds.. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Soaking away toxins, joint and muscle pain and restless legs
customer_reviews.text: This is pure Epsom Salts! It's potent and I love this brand! I use this for detox from mold toxins and joint and muscle pain. Also great for restless legs. This brand I feel works better than others I've bought at the store and the price is very affordable - I go through 20lbs a month. So having this bad shipped to my door is a plus :).
customer_reviews.author: Melinda McElveen

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a baby
customer_reviews.text: 1/4 -1/2 cup in your hot bath and you will sleep like a baby. We are in our 60's and usually get up during the night but when we use this in a bath, those nights we are out until morning. Amazing stuff. Big bag is great- we store it under the sink and use a small plastic container near the tub. Great to buy in bulk, you will want to use it often.
customer_reviews.author: V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like the stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure that it really works, or do anything for my aches and pains after a hard-workout. However, at the end of my day, before bedtime I soak with Epsoak to help decompress from the day.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy and great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this salt for baths for dealing with my lower back arthritis and sore muscles and joints. I love how quickly it dissolves. The salt is fine and I can get quite a few good soaks out of one of these large bags
customer_reviews.author: Dacia Ketterer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say holy boat load of Epsom Salt. You do not think something will weigh so much. I use this in foot soaks and on compresses (no tub) and it works so much better than any other. Dissolves a lot quicker too. My plants (that I haven't killed yet) love it too.
customer_reviews.author: N Olson

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs this
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day in my bath. Because it’s unscented, there’s no chance if developing infections (for females). It really does work easing aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge bag and I have bought four or five of them now. Pretty simple straightforward Epsom salt. I usually add spearmint and eucalyptus oil’s to it when I take a bath. Definitely helps with relaxing muscles and relaxing mind.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect end of the week remedy
customer_reviews.text: If you soak for 30 minutes at the end of the week It’s a game changer and resets your equilibrium. You will know what I mean once you do it. Hot bath and a few cups. That’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

product_meta.title: Epsoak Epsom Salt 19 lb. Bulk Bag Magnesium Sulfate USP
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY PURE UNSCENTED EPSOM SALT (Packaged in USA): Epsoak Epsom Salt (Magnesium Sulfate) is USP grade. It is GMO free (Genetically Modified Organism).

DISSOLVES QUICKLY/GREAT VALUE: After soaking in Epsoak Epsom Salt it becomes clear why Epsoak is the leading name in Epsom Salt. The expertly selected grain size of Epsoak Epsom Salt means that it dissolves quickly & easily in warm water without hassle every single time. It's transparent/slightly white in color, and is unscented. Buy in BULK and save.

RELAX MUSCLES & IMPROVE SKIN: Known for its amazing therapeutic qualities, an epsom salt bath can help to relieve muscle aches and pains, relieve aching feet, cleanse pores, flush out toxins, detoxify the skin. Mix with shower gel to create your own body scrub.

WORKS ON PLANTS AND GARDEN: Epsom Salt can do amazing things to help your Garden flourish. Epsom Salt for plants is a completely natural and cost efficient way to give them that extra boost to help your plants thrive. Use on plants, lawn, shrubs and more…
